name: Elekta AB
goal: Elekta is proud to be the leading innovator of equipment and software used to improve, prolong and save the lives of people with cancer and brain disorders. Our advanced, effective solutions are created in collaboration with customers, and more than 6,000 hospitals worldwide rely on Elekta technology. Our treatment solutions and oncology informatics portfolios are designed to enhance the delivery of radiation therapy, radiosurgery and brachytherapy, and to drive cost efficiency in clinical workflows. Elekta employs 3,700 people around the world. Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Elekta is listed on NASDAQ Stockholm.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Medical Device Regulation
HTA
Reach/RoHS
Batteries Directive
WEEE Directive
Brexit and Iran
